segments.text: I'm looking for a string of pearls for my wife .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . What price range do you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure . I don't know very much about the price of pearls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Let me show you some samples of various qualities . This one is very nice . It's three hundred and fifty dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are having a sale now . The price has already gone down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's two hundred and eighty dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll take it . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
